content.body: zcorpan: Could I ask you for a review of https://github.com/WICG/responsive-image-client-hints/pull/33 ? Please ignore whether or not you think client hints and/or the responsive image client hints are a good idea, and – assuming they are – let me know if the way I'm integrating with HTML and the "parse a sizes attribute" algorithm makes sense..
content.formatted_body: zcorpan: Could I ask you for a review of https://github.com/WICG/responsive-image-client-hints/pull/33 ? Please ignore whether or not you think client hints and/or the responsive image client hints are a good idea, and – assuming they are – let me know if the way I'm integrating with HTML and the "parse a sizes attribute" algorithm makes sense..

content.body: zcorpan: (and/or others with insight) I’m trying to get a sense of the developer impact of https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/7839 and https://github.com/w3c/csswg-drafts/pull/7224 and the related tests in https://wpt.fyi/results/css/css-ui/compute-kind-widget-generated — that is, what problems or developer pain points it fixes for developers, how important it is to developers
